parameters.name: options.autoPlay
parameters.description: If true, the video plays automatically when it becomes visible. Default: 'false'.

parameters.name: options.pauseOnExit
parameters.description: If true, the video pauses when it leaves the viewport. Default: 'false'.

parameters.name: options.resetOnExit
parameters.description: If true, resets the video to the beginning when it leaves the viewport. Default: 'false'.

parameters.name: options.threshold
parameters.description: Visibility ratio (0.0 to 1.0) required to trigger 'visible' state. Default: 0.5.

returnValues.name: videoRef
returnValues.description: The ref to be assigned to the <video> element.

returnValues.name: isPlaying
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the video is currently playing.

returnValues.name: isVisible
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the video is currently within the viewport threshold.

returnValues.name: play
returnValues.description: Imperative function to start video playback.

returnValues.name: pause
returnValues.description: Imperative function to pause video playback.

returnValues.name: stop
returnValues.description: Pauses the video and resets currentTime to 0.

returnValues.name: reset
returnValues.description: Resets currentTime to 0 without changing the playback state.
